data.name: Galactic Junk League: Cyberpunk Ultimate Pack
data.detailed_description:
Get the most out of Cyberpunk with The Ultimate Pack! Get two unique Cyberpunk ships 'Phantom' and 'Orchid' exclusive to the DLCs. With the whole Cyberpunk skin set you're ready to build the cyber ship of your dreams and thanks to 30 Space Whiskys combines with 30 days of Pilot License you'll be hitting the top ranks in no time. Also, it's never bad to have extra 1500 Space Credits, right?

The Ultimate Pack includes:

  • Two DLC exclusive Cyberpunk rookie ships ‘Orchid’ and ‘Phantom’
  • The complete 27-piece Cyberpunk building block set
  • 30x Space Whisky to boost match rewards for you and the whole team
  • 30 days of Galactic Pilot License, which doubles your Junk and Class XP rewards
  • 1500 Space Credits, which can be used to purchase other premium items

Content of the Ultimate Pack will be added to your game once you log in to Galactic Junk League. Every DLC pack can only be purchased once for one Steam account.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish, Czech, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Romanian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 and better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
